Articles.Content:
Well, I wish I didn't bomb the Tekistani, but I have to since I'm at war with the nation.

Yeah, running very low on soldiers now, trying every way to cause the Tekistani to blame their leader. Requesting more soldiers.

EDIT:

Should I attack Tekitstan now?

No, you have too little GDP. (Minimum 310M)

EDIT 2: Why is manpower decreasing so rapidly before reaching Near Depletion and much less at Near Depletion? (Conscripted 6k and was surprised I'm still at Near Depletion...)

Edited December 21, 2013 by Designer225
Sent troops to you designer ,and also stationed spies there ,and done all i can for this turn.

Thanks, although the guerilla rebels won't do much dent, it is at least enough to keep the leader busy.

And we finally got to a point where the enemy needs to worry about domestic policies...
yes we may win this battle ,and hope for peace.Also at least i did my best.
Tekitstan is boiling some chemical weapons. He failed the first time.

Tekitstan is boiling some chemical weapons. He failed the first time.

So Tekitstan attacked Kethane Nation out of aggression, right? Because now the UN (aka PEST) holds court hearings for that.
Yup. He declared war on me.

Oil prices are finally in the 30's. Still not a good time to sell though.

EDIT: My main oil reserves are done. Prospected for 4000k and only got 100 Mbbls of oil

Edited December 22, 2013 by rasheed
This time aiding the rebels took me 2 weapon equipments (because 1 is seized at the border)... I can finally save money and just focus on reducing soldiers and manpower...

Yup. He declared war on me.

Well if you think you're going to lose you could have PEST hold a UN court hearing.
I can't open the page. Couldn't find the server.

I can't open the page. Couldn't find the server.

It's www.blocgame.com

It's www.blocgame.com

I was having problems like this as well, but I can't click on any of the links, I'm pretty much stuck on that page.

I've used the shard money to improve my troop's training, increase quality of life, and hire a secret agent, which I used to provide weapons to the rebels. I think we should declare war before he defeats the rebels.
Let's hope that or when Rumsod implements the Army Upkeep.
well i'm trying my besst sent troops to kethane ,but it's taking a toll on my country economically ,and domestic.Also there leader told me to stop spying ,but i think its right to keep him busy .

there leader told me to stop spying

Tell him to go screw himself because he should be smart enough to know that if he didn't want spies screwing with his country, he shouldn't have declared war on our ally.

The war might go well through Christmas Eve and Christmas Day unless something happens...

Meanwhile the leader of Kethane Nation is attempting to negotiate with the leader of Tekitstan to avoid further bloodshed hurting more family before Christmas...

EDIT: I think the leader of Tekitstan ignored his country's Home Front. Any time now...

EDIT 2: Sent an ultimatum and used Tekitstan's problem in that one. If he is to triumph he will have to pay a high price.

EDIT 3: Based on the current condition, I might held out when Tekitstan is in a state of civil war and the government very busy.

Edited December 24, 2013 by Designer225
What's the ultimatum?

"If you don't negotiate things will go worse as a rebellion have happened."

Taken into account of internal problems Tekitstan is having now. Besides, with bad rating, more people will probably join the Tekitstan rebel force and I'll hope to have diplomatic victory.

"If you don't negotiate things will go worse as a rebellion have happened."

Taken into account of internal problems Tekitstan is having now. Besides, with bad rating, more people will probably join the Tekitstan rebel force and I'll hope to have diplomatic victory.

Good, good.

Dustrop is doing pretty well here, and I started increasing oil production.

However, Tekistan managed to stop the rebels, so we will have to give weapons to them.

Edited December 24, 2013 by Bigcheecho
The republic of Kerbria is doing nicely. 40k troops at Vietnam tech with half completed chems. I find that if you are a Asian nation you are conscript 3 times a turn.

Really? Researching WMD? Either way nice job. Also sent you an invitation to join UK (United Kerbals).

Meanwhile, rebels persists...

As usual i have the highest GDP in UK.

Sent money and oil

EDIT: Dammit i somehow got negative money from the damned fees for opposite alignment and eco systems x.x. Don't send money to me

well had a random even occur sending my Quality of life down the drain ,and causing me to nationalized my foreign investment to fix everything.

Edit: Designer we might lose this my country can barely support as I'm suffering quality of life issues.

Edited December 24, 2013 by MGUARN
